features: Featuring Natural Hemp Seed Oil - Our key ingredient brings a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly and is naturally rich in Vitamin E.
Nourishing Shea Butter, Aloe, Avocado and Coconut Oil - Packed with our signature blend of herbal extracts and plant-based ingredients to soothe and condition skin.
Fresh Coconut & Watermelon - More than just a fragrance, our formula includes coconut oil and watermelon extract to nourish and moisturize skin.
Non-Greasy and Lightweight - A perfect formula for a daily body moisturizer packed with natural plant extracts and a fresh, delicious scent.
Cruelty Free & Vegan, Paraben Free, Gluten Free, and suited for all ages and skin types.
body.description: At Hempz, we aim to provide nutrient and mineral rich products enriched with natural hemp seed oil and pure herbal extracts. Our whole body hydrating cream provides deep nourishment and intense moisture to dry and damaged skin. Daily use of our moisturizer will condition skin for healthier looking and feeling complexion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love all the scents!
reviews.reviewText: These hemp lotions are all wonderful. Love all the scents and use after my bath and every night before bed. They all work very well and keeps me moisturized all day and night. These lotions are worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beat lotion ever
reviews.reviewText: I love it...smells amazing, moisturizing at its best. Great for sensitive skin.A bit pricey ..but it works wonders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like summer!
reviews.reviewText: This smells amazing! Reminds me a summer nights and leaves your skin feeling smooth and refreshed. I tend to be sensitive to lotions but this brand doesn’t bother me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NONGREASY finish! Love it, but a bit too sweet!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something nice on Prime Day and saw this lotion on discount! After reading that it has a non greasy finish on the skin, which is what turns me off from moisturizing in general, I figured to try it.It does smell like a watermelon candy, a bit too sweet for my liking. My nose gets used to it after awhile. But it DOES dry nice and nongreasy, which means a lot to me in a humid climate!I need this to get into the habit of moisturizing more without feeling like a slicked up seal. The smell is a bit sickly sweet, but the beauty of Hempz is that there's tons of different scents that they offer. I see a bunch at Ulta and I smell them time to time to see if their scent profiles differ. Feels a bit better than Bath and Body Works lotions since their nongreasy finish is a plus for me.It's been several months and I hadn't been keeping up with moisturizing, and my standard sized bottle is far from empty. I still look forward to trying a different scent. I keep it in my room since the hemp leaf image might bother my conservative family, BUT other than that, it literally smells like any other feminine lotion brand, but dries nicely, so it's a win for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but not very thick
reviews.reviewText: So far I really like the feel and smell of the lotion but it is very thin compared to most lotions. And so I find that I use a lot more. I have used it on my face instead of other lotions just to see if it makes any difference. But on my hands and arms which I lotion up at least twice a day I don't notice any difference, and it doesn't seem particularly moisturizing. So I'm glad I tried this, I love the coconut watermelon smell- and really to me it smells like fresh watermelon; I do know my fruits and I honestly don't smell the coconut - but I probably won't buy it again. I like something that you know you've put lotion on afterward. This is more for someone who doesn't want to feel like they just put lotion on within 5 minutes of using it . It actually surprised me because so many reviews claim that their skin got better and they felt that it was healing. I have found none of that to be the case. However anyone saying that this is an overpowering scent, I can disagree as far as the coconut and watermelon it's just a very light pleasant fragrance and dissipates within 30 minutes or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Lotion out there!!!
reviews.reviewText: Love this lotion - it smells great, feels great on my skin!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great lotion, non greasy and smells wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gave away my bottle
reviews.reviewText: Everything about it was great EXCEPT that the scent was way too powerful. My bathroom smelled like an artificial watermelon factory, and I still smelled of it after taking a shower.
Skin is so soft, not oily or greasy, love the scent ever so light.
This is the best body lotion ever. The scent is not overpowering yet very subtle and nice. Works well in both summer and winter.
This product smells like summer. It is so amazing. My skin has never been softer :)
Smells great, moisturizes well, and it's all natural, What's not to love?
